item.description:
Hey Ya'll -

So this Sunday, 3/7, I'm planning on hiking Sleeping Giant State Park and it'd be great if you all joined!

It's expected to be a beautiful day. Keep your fingers crossed! Depending on response we can all stay together and hike, or split into smaller groups. No One will be left behind!

Rain Date will be the following Sunday, but hopefully we'll get a good day. We'll meet at noon in the Sleeping Giant State Park main parking lot. I don't think there'll be a parking fee this early in the season, but I am probably wrong. If there is, it can't be more than $5.

Let's meet at noon in the parking lot, that gives everyone the morning to have a nice breakfast, get out of church, or do whatever else you do on Sunday morning. We'll hike until about 5:30 at the latest.

Check out this link for directions:
http://www.sgpa.org/s...

Please e-mail me if you have any questions! Hope to see you all there!

-dan
item.name: Hike Sleeping Giant State Park
